title: What's on Your iPhone Home Screen?
content:
Over on our YouTube channel, MacRumors videographer Dan has a new video up where he shares his Home Screen, wallpaper, and all of his current favorite widgets.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

Check out Dan's video to see his setup, and then comment below and show us your own Home Screens. It's always fun to see other peoples' Home Screens, and with ‌widgets‌ and customization options now available, there are more possibilities than ever before.
This article, "What's on Your iPhone Home Screen?" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums
author: Juli Clover
siteTitle: MacRumors: Mac News and Rumors - All Stories
